name: NOBODY CARES
body:
### NOBODY CARES

## The app to eradicate inanity forever.

Never succumb to a dull conversation ever again.
Tell boring people how you really feel with NOBODY CARES, the premier real-life social media app.
This app blasts the phrase "NOBODY CARES" on command, giving YOU the full power to prevent boringness in this world
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
